title: Calories in Deli Turkey
meta_description: Discover calories in deli turkey per 100g serving, including protein, fat, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs for better meal planning.
assumptions: Sliced deli turkey breast, oven-roasted, low-sodium variety, no added sugars or fillers; typical sandwich portion.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, processing, sodium content, and slice thickness. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of deli turkey provides about 100 kcal and 18g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g deli turkey?
faqs.a: Approximately 100 kcal for lean, roasted deli turkey breast.

faqs.q: Is deli turkey high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, about 18g protein per 100g, making it a lean option.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in deli turkey?
faqs.a: Around 800mg per 100g; opt for low-sodium to reduce intake.
Minimal, about 2.5g per 100g, mostly from any binders or seasonings.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in deli turkey?
faqs.a: Deli turkey is pre-cooked; further heating doesn't significantly change calories but may add if oil is used.
